MonsterTrait.Name: Standing Leap
MonsterTrait.Text: The ostrich can jump horizontally up to 20 feet and vertically up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

MonsterTrait.Name: Battle Leaper
MonsterTrait.Text: If a riderless ostrich jumps at least 10 feet and lands within 5 feet of a creature, it has advantage on attacks against that creature this turn.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The ostrich makes two kicking claw attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
